Description:
  The game is set in alternate 50 - ies of the last century. America is occupied by Nazi Germany, flags with swastikas develop on the roof of the White House. Spark Unlimited has decided to use a historical fact - in 1931, Winston Churchill was hit by a car and survived after that - assuming it would be if the military leader was not up to then the pavement.
According to the version of Spark, the invasion of Normandy took place , and the UK and Europe will not stand the Nazi aggression in 1945 ... Events Turning Point: Fall of Liberty has its origins in 1952, when Germany organized a well -planned attack on the eastern coast of the United States, the center armed conflict is New York. Nazi battleships quickly capture the harbor , German aircraft clean the streets from the people . Airships desantiruyut soldiers who occupy the city block by block ... New York fell surprisingly quickly , in the gaze of the enemy turns out to Washington . Can anyone stop the Nazi Blitzkrieg in the U.S..
